@@ -29,2 +29,23 @@
-this_script_dir=`dirname $0`
-this_script_dir=`cd $this_script_dir > /dev/null && pwd`
+source_path="${BASH_SOURCE[0]:-$0}"
+if [[ ${source_path} = */* ]]; then
+	source_path=${source_path%/*}/
+else
+	source_path=./
+fi
+
+if [ -z "${source_path}" ]; then
+	echo "# Could not determine location of configure script"
+	exit 1
+fi
+
+this_script_dir="$(cd -- "${source_path}" > /dev/null && pwd)"
+
+if [ -z "${this_script_dir}" ]; then
+	echo "# Could not determine location of configure script"
+	exit 1
+fi
+
+if [[ "${this_script_dir}" =~ .*[[:space:]]+.* ]]; then
+	echo "# Build path containing space character is not supported"
+	exit 1
+fi
